name: CyTe City
description:
A hand-drawn visual novel/story set in CyTe City. Everyone wears a Cyber Tech Suit, a.k.a. CyTe (pronounced 'city') suit. Everything goes through the suit. The city's currency, technology, food and smells require the suit to be accessible and relevant. One day, Ava's suit stops working, and the technologically advanced city might as well be a deserted island, since without the suit you're basically locked out of town.

This is my first game and is more of a rough draft prototype kind of thing. Thanks for reading.

Game Change Log:

Update 1:  fixed typos in the game description.
